functionDecorators.name: getConversionRates
functionDecorators.description: Returns the conversion rate between the source token and the destination token in 18 decimals, regardless of component token's decimals.

parameterDecorators.name: _sourceToken
parameterDecorators.description: Address of source token to be sold.

parameterDecorators.name: _destinationToken
parameterDecorators.description: Address of destination token to buy.

parameterDecorators.name: _sourceQuantity
parameterDecorators.description: Amount of source token to sell.

functionDecorators.name: getSpender
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address to approve source tokens to for trading. This is the Kyber Network Proxy address.

returnDecorators.description: address Address of the contract to approve tokens to.

functionDecorators.name: getTradeCalldata
functionDecorators.description: Calculate Kyber trade encoded calldata. To be invoked on the SetToken.

parameterDecorators.name: _sourceToken
parameterDecorators.description: Address of source token to be sold.

parameterDecorators.name: _destinationToken
parameterDecorators.description: Address of destination token to buy.

parameterDecorators.name: _sourceQuantity
parameterDecorators.description: Amount of source token to sell.

parameterDecorators.name: _minDestinationQuantity
parameterDecorators.description: Min amount of destination token to buy.
